price: Ka ce: "Wãne ne ya haramta ƙawar Allah, wadda Ya fitar sabõda bãyinSa, da mãsu dãɗi daga abinci?" Ka ce: "Sũ, dõmin waɗanda suka yi ĩmani suke a cikin rãyuwar dũniya, suna keɓantattu a Rãnar Kiyãma. "Kamar wannan ne Muke bayyana ãyõyi, daki-daki, ga mutãnen da suke sani.
arabic: قُلۡ مَنۡ حَرَّمَ زِينَةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ لِعِبَادِهِۦ وَٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ مِنَ ٱلرِّزۡقِۚ قُلۡ هِيَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا خَالِصَةٗ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul man ḥarrama zīnata al-lahi allatī akhraja liʿibādihi wal-ṭayibāti mina al-riz'qi qul hiya lilladhīna āmanū fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā khāliṣatan yawma al-qiyāmati kadhālika nufaṣṣilu al-āyāti liqawmin yaʿlamūna
